ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T15:52:06 [Issue ID 4000-714315] urn:comicvine:4000-714315 urn:comixology:785998 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 19:45:00. [Issue ID 2001641]
ComicInfo.Summary: The Darkeness at the End of the Lane: Veronica and Betty, along with Predator-Archie, unsuccessfully attempt to travel down Memory Lane in order to erase the events of the Predator invasion. Disappointed, they decide to travel to Greendale, and possibly obtain Sabrina's help. During the journey, Betty dreams of herself and an other-dimensional Dilton Doiley preparing for a Halloween party. Betty awakens to discover that in leaving Riverdale, they traveled to another dimension, possibly as a result of that dimension's Dilton, from Betty's dream.
ComicInfo.Tags: Mars,Archie Andrews,Dilton Doiley,Jughead Jones,Riverdale,Archie Predator,Predator,Betty Cooper,Veronica Lodge,Predators
ComicInfo.Title: The Darkeness at the End of the Lane
